allow: Bash(git -C "c:\\sourcecode\\GitHub\\jellyfin-plugin-warmpool" add WarmFFmpegProcessPool.cs WarmPoolController.cs WarmPoolManager.cs WarmProcessInfo.cs WarmProcessProvider.cs meta.json)

Bash(git -C "c:\\sourcecode\\GitHub\\jellyfin-plugin-warmpool" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
v1.3.0: Keep live stream alive after warm pool adoption

Fixes the critical bug where adopted FFmpeg processes died immediately
because SessionManager independently closed the tvheadend connection.

Changes:
- IWarmProcessProvider.TryAdoptProcess now receives liveStreamId
- WarmProcessInfo stores LiveStreamId for cleanup on eviction
- WarmFFmpegProcessPool.StopWarmProcessAsync closes the live stream
  via IMediaSourceManager.CloseLiveStream when evicting a process
- All components now inject IMediaSourceManager for live stream lifecycle
- WarmPoolController.StopWarmProcess is now async
- Bumped version to 1.3.0

The fix works with a corresponding core Jellyfin change that bumps the
live stream''s ConsumerCount after adoption, preventing SessionManager''s
CloseLiveStreamIfNeededAsync from closing the tuner connection.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
